languages.text: {n}Массивная фигура малатека Асклепия замерла перед когитатором в молитвенной позе. Не поднимая головы, он обращается к вам:{/n} "Я приветствую властител{mf|я|ницу} сего корабля".
{n}The massive figure of the malatek Asclepius is frozen before the cogitator in a praying pose. Without raising his head, he addresses you:{/n} "I salute the ruler of this ship."
languages.original_text: {n}Массивная фигура малатека Асклепия замерла перед когитатором в молитвенной позе. Не поднимая головы, он обращается к вам:{/n} "Я приветствую властител{mf|я|ницу} сего корабля".

traits.locale_text: {n}The massive figure of the Malatek Asclepius is frozen before the cogitator in a praying pose. Without raising his head, he addresses you:{/n} "I salute the ruler of this ship."

{n}The massive figure of the Malatek Asclepius is frozen before the cogitator in a praying pose. Without raising his head, he addresses you:{/n} "I salute the ruler of this ship."

languages.text: {n}La enorme figura del malatek Asclepius está inmóvil ante el cogitador en pose de oración. Sin levantar la cabeza, se dirige a ti:{/n} «Saludos, señor{mf||a} de esta nave».
languages.original_text: {n}The massive figure of the malatek Asclepius is frozen before the cogitator in a praying pose. Without raising his head, he addresses you:{/n} "I salute the ruler of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}La enorme figura del Malatek Asclepius está inmóvil ante el cogitador en pose de oración. Sin levantar la cabeza, se dirige a ti:{/n} «Saludos, señor{mf||a} de esta nave».

languages.text: {n}マラテク・アスクレピオスの巨大な人影が、祈る姿勢で考算機の前で硬直している。彼は頭を上げずにこちらに話しかけてきた。{/n}「この船の主に敬礼する」
languages.original_text: {n}The massive figure of the malatek Asclepius is frozen before the cogitator in a praying pose. Without raising his head, he addresses you:{/n} "I salute the ruler of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラテク・アスクレピオスの巨大な人影が、祈る姿勢で考算機の前で硬直している。彼は頭を上げずにこちらに話しかけてきた。{/n}「この船の主に敬礼する」

languages.text: {n}身材高大的黑暗贤者阿斯克勒庇俄斯以祈祷的姿势伫立在沉思者前。他低垂着头，向你致意。{/n}“向这艘舰船的统治者致敬。”
languages.original_text: {n}The massive figure of the malatek Asclepius is frozen before the cogitator in a praying pose. Without raising his head, he addresses you:{/n} "I salute the ruler of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}身材高大的马拉泰克·阿斯克勒庇俄斯以祈祷的姿势伫立在思考器前。他低垂着头，向你致意。{/n}“向这艘舰船的统治者致敬。”

languages.text: {n}Asclépios est figé dans une pose de prière devant le cogitateur. L'imposant malatek s'adresse à vous sans relever la tête.{/n} « Je vous salue, ô {mf|maître|maîtresse} de ce vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}The massive figure of the malatek Asclepius is frozen before the cogitator in a praying pose. Without raising his head, he addresses you:{/n} "I salute the ruler of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Asclépios est figé dans une pose de prière devant le cogitateur. L'imposant malatek s'adresse à vous sans relever la tête.{/n} « Je vous salue, ô {mf|maître|maîtresse} de ce vaisseau. »

languages.text: {n}Die riesige Gestalt des Malatek Asclepius betet reglos vor dem Cogitator. Ohne seinen Kopf zu heben, spricht er dich an:{/n} "Ich grüße {mf|den Herrscher|die Herrscherin} über dieses Schiff."
languages.original_text: {n}The massive figure of the malatek Asclepius is frozen before the cogitator in a praying pose. Without raising his head, he addresses you:{/n} "I salute the ruler of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die riesige Gestalt des Malatek Asclepius betet reglos vor dem Cogitator. Ohne seinen Kopf zu heben, spricht er dich an:{/n} "Ich grüße {mf|den Herrscher|die Herrscherin} über dieses Schiff."

languages.text: {n}Teküfran Asclepius, kavramsayarın önünde tüm heybetiyle dua eder pozisyonda duruyor. Başını kaldırmadan sana sesleniyor.{/n} "Bu geminin önderine selam olsun."
languages.original_text: {n}The massive figure of the malatek Asclepius is frozen before the cogitator in a praying pose. Without raising his head, he addresses you:{/n} "I salute the ruler of this ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Teküfran Asclepius, kavramsayarın önünde tüm heybetiyle dua eder pozisyonda duruyor. Başını kaldırmadan sana sesleniyor.{/n} "Bu geminin önderine selam olsun."
